name: hopon-monorepo-root
description: Root helper scripts to run frontend (Next.js) and backend (Flask) together for local development

scripts.setup:backend: sh -c 'if [ ! -d backend/.venv ]; then python3 -m venv backend/.venv && backend/.venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && backend/.venv/bin/python -m pip install -e backend; else echo "Backend venv already exists"; fi'
scripts.cleanup: sh -c 'for port in 3000 3001 3002 3003 8000; do fuser -k $port/tcp 2>/dev/null || true; done; sleep 2'
scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && npm run setup:backend && npx concurrently "npm:dev:frontend" "npm:dev:backend"
